original_text: Locusts have no king to lead them, but they all fly together as one. Locusts have no king to lead them, but they all fly together as one. Locusts have no king to lead them, but they all fly together as one. Locusts have no king to lead them, but they all fly together as one. Locusts have no king to lead them, but they all fly together as one. Locusts have no king to lead them, but they all fly together as one. Locusts have no king to lead them, but they all fly together as one.
korean_text: 임금이 없으되 다 떼를 지어 나아가는 메뚜기와

sentences.original_text: Locusts have no king to lead them
but they all fly together as one
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 모두 하나처럼 함께 날아간다
